Constructor Detail

Scope

public Scope()
Creates a new empty authorisation request scope.

Method Detail

isValid

public boolean isValid()
Checks if the scope is valid according to the OpenID Connect specification. This is done by examining if the scope contains an StdScopeMember.OPENID instance.

Returns:
true if this scope if valid, else false.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns the canonical string representation of this scope. The scope values are delimited by space.

Overrides:
toString in class java.util.AbstractCollection<ScopeMember>
Returns:
The string representation of this scope.

parseStrict

public static Scope parseStrict(java.lang.String s)
                         throws ParseException
Parses the specified scope string containing standard scope members.

See ScopeParser.

Parameters:
s - A string containing one or more standard scope members delimited by space.
Returns:
The parsed scope.
Throws:
ParseException - If an unexpected scope member is encountered or a StdScopeMember.OPENID is missing.
